page.title: 12FARMING - TYSOE - ANALYSIS
page.content: No.Farms Total Average Acreage 7 1029 147 Total Crops 2 130 65 Wheat 2 102 51 Other Crops 2 28 14 Grass 7 897 128 Ridge & Furrow 7 424 60 No.Beef Cattle 5 240 48 No. Dairy Cattle 4 247 62 No. Sheep 6 1100 183 No. Tractors 7 16 2 No. Combines 2 2 1 Emoloyed Labour 2 2 1 87% of the total acreage is grass, 41% being ridge and furrow. All the farms make hay, two make silage as well. Four of the farms bring their sheep inside to lamb at night. Two of the farms are Council Smallholdings; one, a barely viable 50 acres, will probably be combined with another holding when the tenant retires.
